Pointe-Noire is the second-largest town in the Republic of the Congo, located in the south within the Kouilou Department. As of 2007, its population was 715,000. Pointe-Noire is a commune divided into six urban districts (arrondissements): *Patrice Emery Lumumba district, the oldest area. It is the administrative and commercial centre. *Mvou-Mvou *Tié-Tié *Loandjili district *Mongo-Pokou district *Ngoyo district ==References== Category:Towns in the Republic of the Congo
